point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Reviewers tend to ignore video-on-demand releases.
sentences.chinese: 评论家倾向于忽视视频点播发布。

sentences.english: Rear projection TV receives satellite TV program, High-quality VOD (video on demand).

sentences.english: Whether accessed via cable television or the internet, video on demand is likely to grow.
sentences.chinese: 无论通过有线电视还是因特网，视频点播均可能增长。
